verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֣חַ <S%H5329><s%> lam-natz-Tze-acho the chief Musician אַל־ [T'al- תַּשְׁחֵת֮ <S%H516><s%> tash-Chet Altaschith לְדָוִ֪ד <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid of David מִ֫כְתָּ֥ם <S%H4387><s%> mich-Tam Michtam בִּשְׁלֹ֥חַ <S%H7971><s%> bish-Lo-ach sent שָׁא֑וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul; when Saul וַֽיִּשְׁמְר֥וּ <S%H8104><s%> vai-yish-me-Ru and they watched אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַ֝בַּ֗יִת <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit, the house לַהֲמִיתֽוֹ׃ <S%H4191><s%> la-ha-mi-To. to kill him הַצִּילֵ֖נִי <S%H5337><s%> hatz-tzi-Le-ni Deliver מֵאֹיְבַ֥י׀ <S%H341><s%> me-'o-ye-Vai me from mine enemies אֱלֹהָ֑י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hai; O my God מִּמִתְקוֹמְמַ֥י <S%H6965><s%> mi-mit-kom-Mai me from them that rise up תְּשַׂגְּבֵֽנִי׃ <S%H7682><s%> te-sag-ge-Ve-ni. defend

הַ֭צִּילֵנִי <S%H5337><s%> Hatz-tzi-le-ni Deliver מִפֹּ֣עֲלֵי <S%H6466><s%> mip-Po-'a-lei me from the workers אָ֑וֶן <S%H205><s%> 'A-ven; of iniquity וּֽמֵאַנְשֵׁ֥י <S%H582><s%> u-me-'an-Shei men דָ֝מִ֗ים <S%H1818><s%> da-Mim, me from bloody הוֹשִׁיעֵֽנִי׃ <S%H3467><s%> ho-shi-'E-ni. and save

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki For הִנֵּ֪ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh behold אָֽרְב֡וּ <S%H693><s%> 'a-re-Vu For lo they lie in wait לְנַפְשִׁ֗י <S%H5315><s%> le-naf-Shi, for my soul יָג֣וּרוּ <S%H1481><s%> ya-Gu-ru are gathered עָלַ֣י <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai against עַזִ֑ים <S%H5794><s%> 'a-Zim; the mighty לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- nor פִשְׁעִ֖י <S%H6588><s%> fish-'I against me not [for] my transgression וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- nor חַטָּאתִ֣י <S%H2403><s%> chat-ta-Ti nor [for] my sin יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. O LORD

בְּֽלִי־ <S%H1097><s%> be-li- no עָ֭וֹן <S%H5771><s%> 'A-von themselves without [my] fault יְרוּצ֣וּן <S%H7323><s%> ye-ru-Tzun They run וְיִכּוֹנָ֑נוּ <S%H3559><s%> ve-yik-ko-Na-nu; and prepare ע֖וּרָה <S%H5782><s%> 'U-rah awake לִקְרָאתִ֣י <S%H7125><s%> lik-ra-Ti to help וּרְאֵה׃ <S%H7200><s%> u-re-'eh. me and behold

וְאַתָּ֤ה <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tah O יְהוָֽה־ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh- Thou therefore O LORD אֱלֹהִ֥ים׀ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him God צְבָא֡וֹת <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'ot of hosts אֱלֹ֘הֵ֤י <S%H430><s%> 'e-Lo-Hei the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel הָקִ֗יצָה <S%H6974><s%> ha-Ki-tzah, awake לִפְקֹ֥ד <S%H6485><s%> lif-Kod to visit כָּֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> kal- all הַגּוֹיִ֑ם <S%H1471><s%> hag-go-Yim; all the heathen אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תָּחֹ֨ן <S%H2603><s%> ta-Chon be not merciful כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- to any בֹּ֖גְדֵי <S%H898><s%> Bo-ge-dei transgressors אָ֣וֶן <S%H205><s%> 'A-ven to any wicked סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Se-lah. Selah

יָשׁ֣וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> ya-Shu-vu They return לָ֭עֶרֶב <S%H6153><s%> La-'e-rev at evening יֶהֱמ֥וּ <S%H1993><s%> ye-he-Mu they make a noise כַכָּ֗לֶב <S%H3611><s%> chak-Ka-lev, like a dog וִיס֥וֹבְבוּ <S%H5437><s%> vi-Sov-vu and go round about עִֽיר׃ <S%H5892><s%> 'Ir. the city

הִנֵּ֤ה׀ <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold יַבִּ֘יע֤וּן <S%H5042><s%> yab-Bi-'Un Behold they belch out בְּפִיהֶ֗ם <S%H6310><s%> be-fi-Hem, with their mouth חֲ֭רָבוֹת <S%H2719><s%> Cha-ra-Vot swords בְּשִׂפְתוֹתֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H8193><s%> be-sif-to-tei-Hem; [are] in their lips כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- For מִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> mi Who שֹׁמֵֽעַ׃ <S%H8085><s%> sho-Me-a'. for who [say they] doth hear

וְאַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tah O יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh But thou O LORD תִּשְׂחַק־ <S%H7832><s%> tis-chak- shalt laugh לָ֑מוֹ la-mo; תִּ֝לְעַ֗ג <S%H3932><s%> til-'Ag, in derision לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol all גּוֹיִֽם׃ <S%H1471><s%> go-Yim. at them thou shalt have all the heathen

עֻ֭זּוֹ <S%H5797><s%> uz-zo [Because of] his strength אֵלֶ֣יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha about אֶשְׁמֹ֑רָה <S%H8104><s%> 'esh-Mo-rah; will I wait כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- For אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him, upon thee for God מִשְׂגַּבִּֽי׃ <S%H4869><s%> mis-gab-Bi. [is] my defence

אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei The God; חַסְדֹּו chas-dov כחַסְדִּ֣י <S%H2617><s%> chas-Di favour קיְקַדְּמֵ֑נִי <S%H6923><s%> ye-kad-de-Me-ni; shall prevent אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him, me God יַרְאֵ֥נִי <S%H7200><s%> yar-'E-ni shall let me see בְשֹׁרְרָֽי׃ <S%H8324><s%> ve-sho-re-Rai. [my desire] upon mine enemies

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תַּהַרְגֵ֤ם׀ <S%H2026><s%> ta-har-Gem Slay פֶּֽן־ <S%H6435><s%> pen- or יִשְׁכְּח֬וּ <S%H7911><s%> yish-ke-Chu forget עַמִּ֗י <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mi, them not lest my people הֲנִיעֵ֣מוֹ <S%H5128><s%> ha-ni-'E-mov scatter בְ֭חֵילְךָ <S%H2428><s%> Ve-chei-le-cha them by thy power וְהוֹרִידֵ֑מוֹ <S%H3381><s%> ve-ho-ri-De-mov; and bring them down מָֽגִנֵּ֣נוּ <S%H4043><s%> ma-gin-Ne-nu our shield אֲדֹנָֽי׃ <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai. O Lord

חַטַּאת־ <S%H2403><s%> chat-tat- [For] the sin פִּ֗ימוֹ <S%H6310><s%> pi-mo, of their mouth דְּֽבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- [and] the words שְׂפָ֫תֵ֥ימוֹ <S%H8193><s%> se-Fa-Tei-mov of their lips וְיִלָּכְד֥וּ <S%H3920><s%> ve-yil-la-che-Du let them even be taken בִגְאוֹנָ֑ם <S%H1347><s%> vig-'o-Nam; in their pride וּמֵאָלָ֖ה <S%H423><s%> u-me-'a-Lah and for cursing וּמִכַּ֣חַשׁ <S%H3585><s%> u-mik-Ka-chash and lying יְסַפֵּֽרוּ׃ <S%H5608><s%> ye-sap-Pe-ru. [which] they speak

כַּלֵּ֥ה <S%H3615><s%> kal-Leh Consume בְחֵמָה֮ <S%H2534><s%> ve-che-Mah [them] in wrath כַּלֵּ֪ה <S%H3615><s%> kal-Leh consume וְֽאֵ֫ינֵ֥מוֹ <S%H369><s%> ve-'Ei-Ne-mov may be no וְֽיֵדְע֗וּ <S%H3045><s%> ve-ye-de-'U, [them] that they [may] not [be] and let them know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- that אֱ֭לֹהִים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him that God מֹשֵׁ֣ל <S%H4910><s%> mo-Shel ruleth בְּיַעֲקֹ֑ב <S%H3290><s%> be-ya-'a-Ko; in Jacob לְאַפְסֵ֖י <S%H657><s%> le-'af-Sei unto the ends הָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz of the earth סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Se-lah. Selah

וְיָשׁ֣וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> ve-ya-Shu-vu let them return לָ֭עֶרֶב <S%H6153><s%> La-'e-rev And at evening יֶהֱמ֥וּ <S%H1993><s%> ye-he-Mu [and] let them make a noise כַכָּ֗לֶב <S%H3611><s%> chak-Ka-lev, like a dog וִיס֥וֹבְבוּ <S%H5437><s%> vi-Sov-vu and go round about עִֽיר׃ <S%H5892><s%> 'Ir. the city

הֵ֭מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah like; יְנוּעוּן ye-nu-'un כיְנִיע֣וּן <S%H5128><s%> ye-ni-'Un continually קלֶאֱכֹ֑ל <S%H398><s%> le-'e-Chol; for meat אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- if לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo are not יִ֝שְׂבְּע֗וּ <S%H7646><s%> yis-be-'U, if they be not satisfied וַיָּלִֽינוּ׃ <S%H3885><s%> vai-ya-Li-nu. and grudge

וַאֲנִ֤י׀ <S%H589><s%> va-'a-Ni I אָשִׁ֣יר <S%H7891><s%> 'a-Shir But I will sing עֻזֶּךָ֮ <S%H5797><s%> 'uz-ze-Cha of thy power וַאֲרַנֵּ֥ן <S%H7442><s%> va-'a-ran-Nen yea I will sing aloud לַבֹּ֗קֶר <S%H1242><s%> lab-Bo-ker, in the morning חַ֫סְדֶּ֥ךָ <S%H2617><s%> chas-De-cha of thy mercy כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for הָיִ֣יתָ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yi-ta have been מִשְׂגָּ֣ב <S%H4869><s%> mis-Gav for thou hast been my defence לִ֑י Li; וּ֝מָנ֗וֹס <S%H4498><s%> u-ma-Nos, and refuge בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> be-Yom in the day צַר־ <S%H6862><s%> tzar- of my trouble לִֽי׃ Li.

עֻ֭זִּי <S%H5797><s%> 'Uz-zi Unto thee O my strength אֵלֶ֣יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha about אֲזַמֵּ֑רָה <S%H2167><s%> 'a-zam-Me-rah; will I sing כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- For אֱלֹהִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him for God מִ֝שְׂגַּבִּ֗י <S%H4869><s%> mis-gab-Bi, [is] my defence אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei [and] the God חַסְדִּֽי׃ <S%H2617><s%> chas-Di. of my mercy
